channel.title: CVE Feed for ABB -- ABB Device Library Wizard

item.title: CVE-2020-8482|2024-08-04T10:03:45.846Z -- abb -- abb%20device%20library%20wizard
item.description: Insecure storage of sensitive information in ABB Device Library Wizard versions 6.0.X, 6.0.3.1 and 6.0.3.2 allows unauthenticated low privilege user to read file that contains confidential data
